# Vendor

This vendor directory contains third-party software.

## doctest

The doctest directory contains doctest, the fastest feature-rich C++11/14/17/20
single-header testing framework for unit tests and TDD.

The following directories have been deleted to reduce storage consumption:

* doctest/doc/
* doctest/examples/
* doctest/scripts/data/

Project URL: https://github.com/onqtam/doctest
